Benchmarks¶

Below are few benchmarks of the code.

Time Taken vs Tolerance¶

These benchmarks were performed for size of the matrix \(N = 1000000\), with atmost \(M = 100\) particles or nodes in a leaf box.

Tolerance Assembly(s) MatVec(s)
\(10^{-2}\) 12.1156 6.97508
\(10^{-4}\) 22.649 6.79404
\(10^{-6}\) 94.8494 8.81189
\(10^{-8}\) 221.221 35.9898
\(10^{-10}\) 502.092 60.7432
\(10^{-12}\) 795.797 87.0883
\(10^{-14}\) 1278.38 126.954

Time Taken vs Size of Matrix¶

For these benchmarks, the leaf size is atmost \(M = 100\), with tolerance set to \(10^{-12}\)

\(N\) Assembly(s) MatVec(s)
\(10^{3}\) 0.034163 0.00362
\(5 \times 10^{3}\) 1.05146 0.029745
\(10^{4}\) 2.95279 0.046561
\(5 \times 10^{4}\) 27.0407 0.389191
\(10^{5}\) 89.297 1.67967
\(5 \times 10^{5}\) 336.318 38.3148
\(10^{6}\) 795.797 87.0883
